#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
using std::max;
int main(){
       int T,A,B;
       
       scanf("%d", &T);
       
       while(T--)
       {
          A = B = 0;
          scanf("%d%d",&A,&B);
          printf("%d %d\n",max(A,B),A+B);
       }
       
       return 0;
       //system("pause");
       }
